pdfcreator

Class SimplePdfCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdfcreator.SimplePdfCreator

  • public class SimplePdfCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for the creation of PDF documents.

    Create an object of this class and call it's createModulePdf method to create a PDF for an existing list of modules and some more parameters.

    Edit parameters in this class to adjust font size, spacings and so on.

    Author:
    AJ

        private org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFont font_bold

      • font_normal

        private org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFont font_normal
        This font is used for content.

      • font_size_title

        private int font_size_title
        Font size for titles.

      • font_size_content

        private int font_size_content
        Font size for content titles, content, page numbers and so on. Generally used for anything that does not match "bigger titles".

      • space_between_lines

        private int space_between_lines
        Specifies the space between entries (Entry). Is also used for index pages to group.

        Note: Has to be greater than space_between_content.

      • space_between_content

        private int space_between_content
        Specifies the space between content lines. Is also used for index pages.

        Note: Has to be smaller than space_between_lines.

      • page_offset_top

        private int page_offset_top
        Page offset used to start text paintings.

      • page_offset_left

        private int page_offset_left
        Page offset used to start text paintings.

        Page offset used to start text paintings.

      • page_offset_bottom

        private int page_offset_bottom
        Page offset used to start text paintings.

      • content_title_width

        private int content_title_width
        Width of the content title. Used to determine the offset for the content. Horizontal.

      • content_offset_after_title

        private int content_offset_after_title
        Offset for content after a title. Vertical.

      • index_content_offset

        private int index_content_offset
        Offset for and index page entry. Offsets the content from its group title. Horizontal.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • get_current_time

        private java.lang.String get_current_time()
        Creates a time stamp with current date and time. Is used during PDF creation as creation time.
        Returns:
        String with current date and time. Format: "E yyyy.MM.dd 'um' hh:mm:ss a zzz"

      • divide_string

        private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> divide_string(java.lang.String string,
                                                   float max_size,
                                                   org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFont font,
                                                   int font_size)
        Divides a given string into a list of Strings. In many cases the string for the content of entries (Entry) is longer than a line on the PDF. In this case the string gets divided by the max_size parameter to fit into multiple lines.
        Parameters:
        string - The String that gets divided.
        max_size - The length of divided Strings.
        font - The Font that is used to determine the length of a String.
        font_size - The Font's size that is used to determine the length of a String.
        Returns:
        A list of strings.

      • createTitlePage

        private org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDPage createTitlePage(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument doc,
                                               java.lang.String institute,
                                               java.lang.String faculty,
                                               java.lang.String degree,
                                               java.lang.String po,
                                               java.lang.String last_modification_date,
                                               java.lang.String last_author,
                                               java.lang.String semester,
                                               java.lang.String version)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                                         org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException
        Creates a title page for the PDF document.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document the page is created for.
        institute - The institute this document is belonging to.
        faculty - The faculty this document is belonging to.
        degree - The degree of this document. ("Master" , "Bachelor")
        po - Examination Regulations. e.g. "FSPO 2012"
        last_modification_date - Last modification date.
        last_author - Last author.
        semester - The semester this document is valid for.
        version - The version number.
        Returns:
        A page. (The title page)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException

      • createModulePages

        private java.util.LinkedList<org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDPage> createModulePages(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument doc,
                                                                       Module module)
                                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                 org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException
        Creates the Module Pages. If a page is full additional pages are created.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document the pages belong to.
        module - A list of modules that is written on the pages.
        Returns:
        A list of Pages. (The content pages)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException

      • createIndexPages

        private java.util.LinkedList<org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDPage> createIndexPages(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument doc,
                                                                      java.util.LinkedList<java.util.LinkedList<Module>> module_subject_list,
                                                                      java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> subject_list,
                                                                      java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> index_page_content_number_list)
                                                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException
        Creates the index page(s) of the document. Pages need to be created at this point.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document the pages belong to.
        module_subject_list - This is a list of lists of modules. First index is used to find the subject the modules are grouped by. The second index gets the actual modules of this subject.
        subject_list - This list of subjects stores the subject strings that are used to group the modules. The index is equal to the first index of module_subject_list parameter.
        index_page_content_number_list - Stores the number of pages a module used. Used to calculate the offset for the page numbers. Order is assumed to be same as modules in module_subject_list parameter.
        Returns:
        A list of Pages. (The index pages)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException

      • createModulePdf

        public void createModulePdf(java.lang.String file,
                   java.util.List<Module> module_list,
                   java.lang.String institute,
                   java.lang.String faculty,
                   java.lang.String degree,
                   java.lang.String po,
                   java.lang.String last_modification_date,
                   java.lang.String last_author,
                   java.lang.String semester,
                   java.lang.String version)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException
        Generates the PDF Document.

        All module_list Module's entries (Entry) have to have a value. If entries have null values the PDF fails to generate.

        The specified file path has to be valid, needs rights for write access, and the file, if already existing, has to be closed to be overwritten!!!

        Parameters:
        file - Path to the file, where it should be stored.
        module_list - A valid List of modules, that belongs to the following attributes:
        institute - The institute this document is belonging to.
        faculty - The faculty this document is belonging to.
        degree - The degree of this document. ("Master" , "Bachelor")
        po - Examination Regulations. e.g. "FSPO 2012"
        last_modification_date - Last modification date.
        last_author - Last author.
        semester - The semester this document is valid for.
        version - The version number.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.pdfbox.exceptions.COSVisitorException
